sentences.sContent: His eyes roved round the supermarket.
sentences.sCn: 他的眼睛环视了一下超级市场。

sentences.sContent: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.sContent_eng: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.sCn: 整个超级市场被一场大火烧掉。

sentences.sContent: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.sContent_eng: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.sCn: 我们学校附近的那个超级市场不久将重新开业。

trans.tranOther: a very large shop that sells food, drinks, and things that people need regularly in their homes
